channel.title: [PI] Only Person There [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys!
Ok, so what I need is something to make it so like there isn't more than 1 player in. Like multiple people can access the area but the only person you'll be able to see is yourself and the NPCs around you. If someone could help me out that would be great. Also if you need a better explanation I can get that too :)

item.title: [PI] Only Person There [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Thank-you very much! I will try this. I would rep you if I could but it says I can’t

Read full topic

item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Ok, so basically I put that where you enter the area and it will work for all people? Just making sure.
